keyMoments.title: Caribou's Numa Numa no Mi Debut
keyMoments.description: Caribou reveals himself as a Logia-type Devil Fruit user with the Numa Numa no Mi (Swamp-Swamp Fruit), demonstrating his ability to transform into mud and create bottomless swamps by killing a Marine.
keyMoments.significance: First Logia-type Devil Fruit and first new Devil Fruit revealed after the two-year timeskip.
keyMoments.quote: I'm a Logia-type Devil Fruit user!

bounties.reason: Pirate captain with Logia Devil Fruit powers

abilities.description: Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into mud/swamp.

reveals.information: Caribou has eaten the Numa Numa no Mi, a Logia-type Devil Fruit
Caribou is cruel and ruthless, willing to kill Marines without hesitation

keyMoments.title: Fake Luffy Exposed as Demaro Black
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru exposes the impostor Luffy as Three-Tongued Demaro Black, a low-ranking pirate with a bounty of only 26 million berries who was impersonating Monkey D. Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the deception of the Fake Straw Hat Crew and demonstrates the vast gap between Luffy's reputation and the impostor's actual standing.

reveals.information: The Fake Luffy is actually Demaro Black with a 26 million berry bounty

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Post-Timeskip Return Revealed
keyMoments.description: The real Luffy's identity is revealed at Grove 46, shocking everyone present including Sentomaru and the Marines. This marks Luffy's official return to the world stage after two years.
keyMoments.significance: Announces to the world that Luffy has returned and is ready for the New World.

keyMoments.title: First Combat Use of Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates his mastery of Armament Haki by coating his arm in black and using a Haki-enhanced Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol to destroy PX-5 in a single hit.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Luffy's Haki abilities in combat, proving he has achieved the power level needed for the New World. Establishes the new power scale for post-timeskip One Piece.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Thanks Rayleigh and Reaffirms His Dream
keyMoments.description: Luffy stops to thank Rayleigh for his training and loudly declares he will become the Pirate King.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional payoff to Rayleigh's training arc and demonstration of Luffy's gratitude and unwavering determination.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you for everything, Rayleigh! I'm definitely going to become the Pirate King!

bounties.reason: Current bounty after the Paramount War

abilities.description: Allows the user to coat their body in an invisible (or black visible) armor that can hit Logia users and enhance attack power.
Combination of Gear Second speed enhancement with Armament Haki coating for devastating attacks.

relationships.description: Rayleigh trained Luffy in Haki for two years, preparing him for the New World.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy thanks Rayleigh for his training before departing for the New World.

reveals.information: Luffy can now use Armament Haki in combat
Luffy can now easily defeat a Pacifista that required the entire crew's effort two years ago

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats PX-7 with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Zoro teams up with Sanji to easily destroy Pacifista PX-7, demonstrating his post-timeskip strength increase.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms that Zoro has also achieved dramatic power growth during the timeskip, making Pacifistas no longer a threat.

reveals.information: Zoro can now easily defeat a Pacifista alongside Sanji

keyMoments.title: Sanji Defeats PX-7 with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sanji uses his improved Diable Jambe technique and teams up with Zoro to easily destroy Pacifista PX-7.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's improved strength after two years of training, making Pacifistas no longer a serious threat.

reveals.information: Sanji's Diable Jambe has improved and he can now easily defeat a Pacifista alongside Zoro

keyMoments.title: Sentomaru Returns with Pacifistas
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru arrives at Grove 46 with two Pacifista units (PX-5 and PX-7) to arrest the assembled pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Reintroduces Sentomaru as a Marine officer continuing his duty to capture pirates.

keyMoments.title: Sentomaru Exposes Fake Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru strikes Fake Luffy and orders PX-5 to reveal his true identity as Demaro Black, showing his respect for the real Luffy by calling the impostor trash.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sentomaru's sense of honor and his acknowledgment of Luffy's actual strength and reputation.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy ain't a piece of trash like you!
